description: Embark on a journey through the many rooms of this great tavern. Can you unlock it's secrets or be lost forever in the maze?

name: Winter Cats
description: Hidden Winter Cats - Find and paint 100 hidden cats in this big snowy location! Test your attention and relax in this cozy and free game

name: 1001 Nights
description: This is an AI-native game. Start a journey in the ancient Persian Empire as Shahrzad. Use magic to turn language into reality, collect unique weapons from the tales, and get revenge on the evil King! The fate of the world is yours to rewrite!

name: 100 Cats Greece
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Greece! Can you find them all?

name: 100 Cats London
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in London! Can you find them all?

name: 100 Cats New York
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in New York! Can you find them all?

name: 100 Hidden Cats in China
description: 100 Hidden Cats in China - Join the cutest adventure in the China! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of China Landscape as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.Can you find them all?

name: 100 Cats Mexico
description: Find 100 Cats hidden in Mexico! Can you find them all?

name: 100 Asian Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Asian Cats.

name: 101 Cats Hidden
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 24 o 'clock
description: It has been impossible to study when it began, but it is gradually accepted by more and more people with its unique mathematical charm and rich connotation. This kind of game is simple and easy to learn, can strengthen the brain puzzle, is a very beneficial activity.

name: New Immortal
description: A text placement game with a cultivation theme, featuring 64 cultivation systems, 24 independent dungeons, multiple interactive modes, and various combat economy modes.

name: Escape From The Test
description: I hate studying, it's too much trouble. If you think so, you might be attacked by "him" too...? Let's escape from the "zero point test" together with the main character!

name: Bug darake no Mura
description: バグを探して、村を元通りにせよ！

name: Stellar Realm Voyage
description: A high degree of freedom space shooting game for Spaceship Modular Editing, Like building blocks. Weapon sequence, branching, and inheritance, constructing weapon systems like real magic. Build a unique spaceship and freely form a fleet to battle or pass levels like a meat pigeon.

name: Ranch Battle
description: Ranch Battle is a top-down arena shooting light ROGUE game where players take on the role of a character who simultaneously uses four weapons to repel swarms of aliens. Choose from various features and props until rescue arrives.

name: Ano-chan wo Byouin ni Tsuretette
description: A game that was actually produced for the TV show "Anochan no Sasayaka na kimochi Desuga..! Take Anochan to the hospital!

name: Falcon 2023
description: You will play the role of a new special police officer who arrives in the dangerous city of Flora. Various violent incidents continue to occur, and the sheriff hires and trains personnel from the outside world in an attempt to fight the terrorists to the death. This operation is codenamed Falcon

name: Time Treker
description: Time Treker is a 2D top-view shooter game. Players engage in constant combat to achieve achievements, activate abilities, and unlock heroes, weapons, and plug-ins. Customize with different combinations of weapons and plug-ins, and play your own combat genre.

name: The Yanus Plan for Escape from the Void
description: "The Yanus Plan for Escape from the Void" is a first person perspective escape room game where you lose your memory and don't know where you are. You have to keep moving forward and explore the truth.

name: Knight Party
description: As a lord on the continent of Oren, lead your knights on various adventures!!

name: Black Stone
description: The game will center around two investigators who uncover a profound terror while delving into consecutive disappearances. A man with a dual-layered memory, a fragmented reality, an endless rainy night... What in the world is the Black Stone? Could it possibly mark the genesis of everything?

name: Rokumenhappi
description: Dice are fun! Everyone knows the rule that if you roll it, the position of the surface will change. This geme is a puzzle game that arranges such dice.

name: Fragmented Leaves: Before the Storm
description: The two former enemies gathered together because of the same enemy. Their task is to prevent the outbreak of a war. However, their efforts were destined to be in vain, and all of this was just a prelude to the outbreak of the great war.

name: Tunshi Unifying Plains
description: "The Conquest of China" is a RPG role-playing game centered around Liu Bei of the Shu Kingdom. Unlike other Three Kingdoms RPGs, the game does not start with the usual storyline, but instead begins with the murder of Liu's mother by the Yellow Turban Rebellion, setting Liu on a path of revenge.

name: Sun-shot Legend
description: What kind of game is this?This is a role-playing game. This work tells the follow-up story of the ancient Chinese myth of shooting the sun. Every nine Yang in the sky, shoot down eight Yang, save the world. The player controls the protagonist to kill monsters to complete the level.

name: Kosaka-san: Remaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Heroes
description: A real-time strategy game where you build your own army to consolidate your territory.

name: Shinrei Ryokan
description: Sin descripción

name: After school
description: After School is a short visual novel about an elementary school student who encounters an injured old woman on her way home from school, and is begged to help her walk home, but is forced to embark on a thrilling journey...

name: Sila Marka
description: A simple RPG with a top view and point & click controls. Repair your spaceship and escape, or start influencing the lives of the local population.

name: Zombion: Survival
description: Zombion: Survival, a gripping twin-stick action shooter, pits you against relentless waves of zombies. Blast through enemies, power up your character with perks, and team up with friends to conquer new challenges. Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate survivor?

name: Zen Quest
description: Zen Quest is a relaxing mindfulness game where you design Zen gardens, learn meditation, partake in mindfulness activities, and explore enchanting spirit worlds.

name: Zen Garden
description: Zen Garden is a relaxing logic game about creating your own Japanese-style garden settings. Through block play and decoration, you can solve puzzles in multiple ways, expressing your imagination and advancing through the story.

name: 9000 Years Ago
description: What would you do if you went back to a time when the land didn't belong to anyone?

name: 77th: The Game
description: 77th: The Game is an abstract representation of the experience of joining an online community. Walk through the community and solve the puzzles to progress as a community member.

name: 3D Puzzle: Factory
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: 24H Stories: The Rule 7
description: Recently, people in Japan have been talking about an urban legend: a mysterious program is circulating on the internet. The person who activates this program must follow 7 rules within a week, or they will face punishment, even death. In 7 days, various maddening supernatural events will occur.

In this 2D pixel RPG, 24 navigate battles, puzzles, and quests in a war-torn world devoid of color. Your choices dictate the non-linear plot, with multiple endings and an open world hanging in the balance. Will you bring back color as the savior or succumb to darkness?
A horror visual novel about urban legends of Russian town in 2007.

"1991" is an exciting game set in the USSR in 1991. Your main character, Leshka, has recently turned ten. He made a bet with his friend that he can spend a whole hour in an abandoned building. But things don't go as he expected...

name: 18Hell: Lost
description: "18 Hell:Lost" is a psychological horror indie game set in 1930s Shanghai. Players awaken in a grand hotel, trapped as fate and soul intertwine, leading them deeper into the unknown.

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVI: Olympic Bugs
description: Help Hercules stop Olympian-created sentient machines’ rebellion, uncover the cause, and protect humanity from imminent danger!

name: Unheim
description: UNHEIM is a psychological horror surveillance game of exceptional difficulty in which you must not only report anomalies, but also learn to survive paranormal attacks. Every night is a fight for survival against lurking horrors.

name: Moses & Plato: Last Train to Clawville
description: A murder mystery where you are the main suspect! An ambassador on a peace mission has been killed on board the Clawville Express. Time progresses as you sniff out clues, eavesdrop on conversations, and interrogate passengers. Can you solve the case before the train reaches the last station? Or else.

name: Honour & Freedom II
description: Sin descripción

name: Toxic Tomb
description:
Toxic Tomb is an action platformer with the spirit of a SEGA Master System game.
Crawl along each level and destroy all the generators to force the opening of the reactor. Then attack the reactor to release the ghoul inside it and kill it. Move fast, chain enemy kills and get stars to obtain bonuses. You'll get an extra life every 75.000 points. Finding the right place to attack and dodge is the key. Also, playing gracefully from the beginning will help you in the final stretch of the game.

name: Honour & Freedom II Power Enhanced Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Exiled
description: Charlotte is missing. Decode an ancient language, investigate a mystery, and stay away from ancient monsters in this compact puzzle thriller.

name: Final Fantasy IV
description:
This version of Final Fantasy IV released as part of Final Fantasy IV: The Complete Collection includes many of the features introduced in the Advance version such as the Bestiary, Music Player and bonus dungeons, whilst also incorporating a number of changes and features exclusive to other ports.

The opening FMV returns from the 3D Remake's Nintendo DS port as well as new 3D cinematic cutscenes. There is an option to switch between the original Super Famicom or the arranged 3D Remake versions of the soundtrack. It also includes an auto-battle feature for the first time as well as other gameplay changes.

An Art Gallery containing illustrations by Yoshitaka Amano has also been added.

name: Hope with Island
description: Hope and Island is a simulated production game with adventure solving elements, integrating survival, role playing, strategy and other elements.

name: Rocket Knight Adventures: Re-Sparked
description:
The mightiest mammal to ever rocket to stardom is back in a three-game, Carbon Engine-powered collection that includes:
- Rocket Knight Adventures
- Sparkster: Rocket Knight Adventures 2
- Sparkster

name: Disappearance: Takeshi. You were right. That Abandoned Village is Too Bad
description: Shissou: Takeshi Omae no Iu Toori datta Ano Haison ha Yaba sugiru is a first-person horror comedy game that explores an abandoned village in Japan to find your lost best friend.

name: Inkbowser.exe
description: Sin descripción

name: Cortex Chaos
description: An unreleased Crash Bandicoot game set after Crash Twinsanity which would have been about Dr. Neo Cortex being evicted from the Evil Scientist League because of his fraternising with Crash Bandicoot during the events of that game.

name: Kawã na Terra dos Indígenas Maraguá
description: Kawã na Terra dos Indígenas Maraguá is an educational platformer developed by the Federal University of São Carlos, under its LEETRA laboratory. It tells the story of a young indigenous boy who goes through the Wakaripé ritual. According to the tradition that marks the transition from childhood to adulthood, when boys turn ten, they must pass some tests to demonstrate their bravery. Then, at the age of 15, they face the even more challenging Gualipãg ritual, which entitles them to become "chief hunter-warrior".

name: Everstorm
description: Everstorm is a PVP roguelite extraction game. Each match you will choose your class, level up, choose upgrades, evolve your abilities and fight other players. Defeat the final boss and extract, then upgrade your character and go back in for more!

name: Revenant
description: Reimagining FNAF 3.

name: Diablo IV: Season of the Construct
description:
Ancient forces threaten Sanctuary. Aided by your Seneschal Companion, hazard the many traps and devastating Constructs beneath the deserts of Kehjistan.

Deep beneath the swirling sands, elemental forces are amassing for malicious whims of the demon Malphas. Only by descending far below the surface will you be able to cull this cursed threat from its root.

Prepare to uncover the powerful secrets of Zoltun Kulle’s Loom with a new Dungeon type called Vaults, a seasonal robotic Seneschal Companion, and Weekly Leaderboards in The Gauntlet. Several key quality-of-life features—including almost constant Helltide events—arrive to help aid your conquests while fighting in the Vaults.

name: Resident Evil 2: Source
description: Enter the survival horror. Explore, solve, and fight your way through Raccoon City and it's police department in this source engine remake of Resident Evil 2.

name: Project CW
description: Project CW is a free-to-play high-octane tank combat game set in an alternate Cold War era. Command a diverse roster of Agents and their unique vehicles, from iconic to experimental. Team up and engage in cinematic battles packed with adrenaline and armoured might!

name: Shark's Song
description: Hilda, a sentient bipedal shark, lives with her creator at the bottom of the sea and tries to avoid public attention... but is this what she really wants?

name: Something Unlimited
description:
Something Unlimited is a comic-based parody brothel management game. You play as Lex, seeking to concoct a way to rid the world of superheroes while simultaneously placing yourself on one of its thrones. Unfortunately though, plans of world domination tend to cost a lot of money and you’re practically broke. When Roulette comes to you with the idea for a “meta-bordello”, you think up the perfect way to supply her with incredibly enticing workers – as long as you get a fat cut of the profits, of course.

Will you be able to “convince” enough heroines, henchwomen and villainesses to work for you? Can you grow the bordello enough to bankroll your final plan for world supremacy? Will you finally be able to take down the heroes/heroines once and for all, as well as your villainous rivals?​

name: Christmas Seaman: Omoi o Tsutaeru Mou Hitotsu no Houhou
description: A limited-edition demo version of Seaman titled Christmas Seaman was released in Japan on December 16, 1999, and available for only ten days either through the Sega Direct online store or as part of an exclusive red Dreamcast pack-in. The title allowed players to connect to the online servers and exchange Christmas wishes and messages, while a Santa themed Seaman shares some of his trademark "Seaman wisdom".

name: Sad Satan
description: You have been kidnapped by a gang on the dark web and you need to stay alive , but you find a group of audio recordings and pictures related to horrific crimes amidst screams of suffering in the darkness.

name: GoldenEye With Mario Characters
description: A mod for GoldenEye that replaces all of the characters with ones from the Mario universe along with edited dialog to make more sense with the characters, however the story itself is mainly the same as the original. Some minor changes have been made to the levels to work better with the characters, as well as incorporate scrapped and/or new content.

name: Perfect Dark With Mario Characters
description: A mod for Perfect Dark replaces all of the characters with ones from the Mario universe along with a variety of changes & improvements. For example multiple guards are now female with new outfits for different levels along with the unused Hat mechanic now being utilized with new hat models that guards can wear. While the level layouts & objectives are the same as the original game, some have gotten some noteworthy changes that will throw off experts.

name: Eksperyment Delfin
description:
In the year 2068, humanity managed to conquer the fourth dimension: time. Time travel becomes so widespread that a danger arises - someone may try not only to learn about the past, but also to alter history. Now it is the year 2098. The player takes on the role of special agent Dino Szmit and his job is to pursue such time-villains. The adventure begins as the player wakes up after a time travel accident...

Eksperyment Delfin (Experiment Dolphin) is a point and click adventure that allows the player to travel in time to counter a Nazi conspiracy plot. The game takes the player back to the year 1942 and beyond. It's based on traditional inventory puzzles, enhanced by the ability to jump not only to another location to find a needed item, but also to a different time. The few conversations the player will have feature dialog options.

name: Surf's Up
description: Surf's Up was the third and last game to make use of Amiga's JoyBoard controller. While Amiga's second game Off Your Rocker was sold in limited quantities through Pleasant Valley Video, Surf's Up was never completely finished and sold in stores, most probably because the gameplay was just not interesting enough.

name: Zoo Fun
description: Incomprehensible game about collecting zoo animals. The game is based on the code of Panda Chase from Home Vision (you can still see the little panda heads when you run out of time).

name: Monke Island: Rise of the Beast
description: Monke Island: Rise of the Beast is a spiritual successor and parody of Skull Island: Rise of Kong. Iterating upon everything that made that game a masterpiece but with a new IP. This is the definitive Monke experience, leave humanity and become a giant Monke.

name: Pokemon Orb Version
description: A rom hack of Pokemon Gold released in 2018 by Hacker. It takes place in the Fornes region, which is basically just the Johto region but with city and character names swapped, and some of the maps having new tiles and minor changes to their layouts. It has some features that could make it be considered a "troll/joke hack", like entrances to buildings being different than what they say they are, those same entrances leading to new areas when you leave, purposefully poor grammar, and a higher difficulty overall. It could, however, also just be an earnest attempt at making a rom hack that was poorly done. It's hard to tell as information on this project is very hard to find.

name: Art Camion Geijutsu-den
description: A spin-off game in the Bakusou Dekotora Densetsu series.

name: Ghost Recon: Heroes Unleashed
description: Ghost Recon: Heroes Unleashed, the ruthlessly unforgiving tactical shooter experience. True hardcore realism, with nonlinear play, real-world physics, and ultra smart AI. Infinite replayability, with tons of worldwide maps, missions, game types, international special forces units, and a massive arsenal of authentic weapons and equipment.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Gold Road
description: A forgotten Daedric Prince has returned, bringing chaos to West Weald! Explore a new zone and defend the city of Skingrad, now beset by a dangerous Daedric cult and the jungles of Valenwood. Customize your skills like never before with the new Scribing system.

name: The Hole in Blueblack Lake
description:
The Hole in Blueblack Lake is a text-based weird fiction fishing game for pen, paper, and your computer. The game is primarily played on your computer but there are additional play elements that you can write on paper/digitally.

Catalog uncanny biologies. Breathe cold lake air. Roll dice to catch fish. Enjoy it while it lasts.

name: Dream Tube
description:
// Double click on choices in menus to progress. //

Are you comfortable? Okay, I'm going to begin the procedure now. Please count back from ten, you may feel some discomfort.

A Domino game by Sorrowful Maiden and Australian Dave

Sell your dreams to a corporation for extra money.

name: Luxury Simulator
description: Luxury Simulator is a first person game-essay set in the last bastion of human civilisation, a labyrinthine bunker-palace after time. The viewer as opposed to the traditional narratives of video games, is not a hero - but an individual passing through, another guest in the final elite home of human civilisation. The memory of the fortress's building echoes throughout it's chambers, a lone voice from an era now lost.

name: Warhedz
description: Challenge your friends, on-line or locally, or play against AI to rule the world! In this epic strategy game, invade territories and devise of tactics to defeat your opponents and take over the world.

name: Disgaea 7: Vows of the Virtueless - Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of Disgaea 7 includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of Disgaea 7
- "The Art of War" hardcover art book
- "The Songs of Honor" 2-disc original soundtrack
- Steelbook
- Mini Byoubu Art Display
- "Netherworld Warriors" Yunomi Tea Cup
- Collector's Box

name: SCP-087-B Unity Remake Edition
description: ''SCP-087-B is a small experimental horror game loosely based on SCP-087. You find yourself inside dark hallways and staircases with something lurking below you, and the only way you can go is deeper into the darkness. How deep can you go?''

name: Prism Heart
description: PRISM HEART (プリズム・ハート Purizumu Hāto) is a Japanese erotic video game developed by Pajamas Soft and was first released on October 6, 2000. The game was ported to the Dreamcast on November 29, 2001 with the adult content removed by KID.

name: Trigonometry Dash
description: Sin descripción

name: Landy Land
description: The reckless daughter of famous hero Randall "Randy" Land, Landyssa "Landy" Land spends most of her days terrorizing the countryside under the guise of being a hero. One day, while visiting her friend Mandy, she discovers that her brother Dandy has once again let loose a bunch of evil monsters on Mandy's hometown. Unwilling to let this aggression stand, Landy coerces--er, convinces Mandy to join her on a quest to defeat her evil brother Dandy.

name: Tower of Destiny
description: Dodge spinning blades, jump over lava, and avoid dangerous monsters as you fulfill your destiny and collect all the treasure in the tower.

name: Wagotabi
description:
Wagotabi is an educational journey that will teach you Japanese from the zero. It relies on a new methodology which prioritizes which Hiragana, Katakana or Kanji you should learn and will help you dive deeper in the language immersion from the very start.

Embark on this transformative journey through real Japanese prefectures, immersing yourself in the culture, language, and daily life. Connect with locals, navigate new surroundings, and witness the surprises that unfold at every turn. Feel the sense of belonging as you make strides in understanding and interacting with Japan's rich environment.
